name: parserator-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for Parserator AI-powered text parsing
author: Paul Phillips <phillips.paul.email@gmail.com>

scripts.build: echo 'Building Chrome extension...' && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../parserator-chrome-extension.zip .
scripts.dev: echo 'Load the extension in Chrome from the root directory'
